Package it.polimi.ingsw.network

Class CommunicationHandler

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.CommunicationHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
DisconnectListenerSubscriber
public class CommunicationHandler extends Object implements DisconnectListenerSubscriber
This class is used to handle the message exchange between the server and the client and vice versa.

  • Constructor Details

    • CommunicationHandler

      public CommunicationHandler(boolean isMaster)
      Constructor.
      Parameters:
      isMaster - if true, pings will be sent to ensure that the two parties are connected.
